thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Capio to buy Swedish primary care group Novakliniken

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capio to buy Swedish primary care group Novakliniken
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Capio Ab (Publ):
* CAPIO TO ACQUIRE THE SWEDISH PRIMARY CARE GROUP NOVAKLINIKEN
* SAYS ‍NOVAKLINIKEN OPERATES EIGHT PRIMARY CARE CENTERS AND TWO BRANCHES, AND PROVIDES SOME OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND DENTAL SERVICES​
* ‍SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 100% OF NOVAKLINIKEN WITH OPERATIONS IN SOUTHEASTERN PARTS OF SKÅNE​
* ENTERPRISE VALUE IS MSEK 88 * SAYS NOVAKLINIKEN 2017 NET SALES WERE MSEK 245​ * SAYS ‍ENTERPRISE VALUE IS MSEK 88 AND ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE CLOSED AND INCLUDED IN CAPIO FROM APRIL 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Stockholm Newsroom)
